921490.name: Unchained
921490.description:
Unchained is a fast paced retro multiplayer first person shooter in which you can compete in different game modes and maps, using a large arsenal of unique and deadly weapons, as well as cool power ups to defeat your enemies.

Plot

It is the year 2282. You are one of many laboratory experiments that aim to bring life forms to their maximum capabilities: run faster, jump higher, sustain more damage. You have become all that you can be. Now, you must show that you're the best among the best. Evil minds behind have put their best experiments together in different environments and arenas so they can fight to prove who's the ultimate supreme being.

Key Features

  • 6 online game modes with up to 10 players support

  • 8 different characters to choose from

  • 7 maps that will put you on the verge of your seat

  • 10 deadly weapons, some with secondary modes that will allow you to tackle your enemies in the best possible way

  • 2 unique power ups that will give you the upper hand against your enemies... if used properly

  • Retro style looking graphics

  • Endless carnage
921490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
